name: index-star-v-2-0-0
title: Long RNA STAR genome indexing step v2.0.0
notes: This takes in gencode annotations + tRNAs + spike-ins: *.gtf.gz AND reference genome: *.fasta.gz AND spike-ins alone: *.fasta.gz  THEN output TopHat index *.tgz (containing a bunch of files). We need an index type for the output
